snippet: Former Senator Larry E. Craig is seeking to fend off a federal lawsuit by arguing that the trip that led to his arrest in a sex sting in 2007 was part of his Senate business.
abstract: Former Idaho Sen Larry E Craig is seeking to fend off a federal lawsuit by arguing that the trip that led to his arrest in a sex sting in 2007 was part of his Senate business.
lead_paragraph: Former Senator Larry E. Craig is seeking to fend off a federal lawsuit by arguing that the trip that led to his arrest in a sex sting in 2007 was part of his Senate business.

headline.main: Idaho: Ex-Senator in Bathroom Sting Contests Suit Over Defense Money
headline.print_headline: Idaho: Ex-Senator In Bathroom Sting Contests Suit Over Defense Money
